sangoma::jsr309::MediaConfig

MediaConfig Class Reference

Configuration object for the JSR309 API. This object has methods to help the user add elements in the boost::property_tree::ptree that is kept as a member of this class. Users that wants to use the boost object directly can by calling the ptree() method which returns a reference to the underlying ptree object. More...

#include <mediaconfig.h>

std::ostream & operator<< (std::ostream &out, MediaConfig &media_config)
 Override of operator<< to allow users of the MediaConfig class to print the configuration either in a log statement or in a file.

Detailed Description

Configuration object for the JSR309 API. This object has methods to help the user add elements in the boost::property_tree::ptree that is kept as a member of this class. Users that wants to use the boost object directly can by calling the ptree() method which returns a reference to the underlying ptree object.
Examples:

transcoding-sample.cc.

void SetRfc2833Flag ( bool  enable_rfc2833  )
